//individual codes: MS-Mem and LS-R
1. load rd2,rn2,rm2 and adc  rd1_1, rm1
load r3, r4, r5 and adc r2, r4
1011000111101010_1000100010001000
2. load rd2, rn2, rm2 and sub rd1_2,8'Imm
load r6, r0, r5 and sub r4, 00000001
1010001101101010_0000000110000101
3. load rd2, rn2, rm2 and ror  rd1_1, rm1
load r7, r0, r5 and ror r1, r5
1010001111101010_1010010101101000
4. load rd2, rn2, rm2 and and rd1_1, rm1
load r3, r0, r5 and and r2, r5
1010000111101010_1010100010001000
5. strb rd2, rn2, rm2 and adc  rd1_1, rm1
strb r6, r0, r4 and adc r5, r4
1000001101101011_1001010010001000
6. strb rd2, rn2, rm2 and sub rd1_2,8'Imm
strb r7, r0, r1 and sub r6, 00000010
0010001111101011_0000001011000101
7. strb rd2, rn2, rm2 and ror  rd1_1, rm1
strb r3, r0, r2 and ror r7, r1
0100000111101011_0011110101101000
8. strb rd2, rn2, rm2 and and rd1_1, rm1
strb r2, r0, r3 and and r2, r1
0110000101101011_0010100110001000
9. branch 8'Imm and adc  rd1_1, rm1
branch 00000010 and adc r5, r4
0000001000011011_1001010010001000
10.branch 8'Imm and sub rd1_2,8'Imm
branch 00000010 and sub r7, 00000010
0000001000011011_0000001011100101
11.branch 8'Imm and ror  rd1_1, rm1
branch 00000010 and ror r2, r3
0000001000011011_0110100101101000
12.branch 8'Imm and and rd1_1, rm1
branch 00000010 and and r3, r1
0000001000011011_0010110110001000
13.Jump 11'imm and adc  rd1_1, rm1
jump 00000000010 and adc r1, r7
0000000001011110_1110010010001000
14. Jump 11'imm and sub rd1_2,8'Imm
jump 00000000010 and sub r2, 00000010
0000000001011110_0000001001000101
15.Jump 11'imm and ror  rd1_1, rm1
jump 00000000010 and ror r4, r3
0000000001011110_0111000101101000
16.Jump 11'imm and and rd1_1, rm1
jump 00000000010 and and r6, r1
0000000001011110_0011100110001000
//FU
//forwardA1
//10
1a. strb rd2, rn2, rm2 and adc  rd1_1, rm1
strb r4, r3, r2 and adc r4, r5
0100111001101000_1011000010001000
1b. strb r1, r0, r2 and ror r3, r4
0100000011101011_1000110101101000
//01
2a. strb r4, r3, r2 and adc r4, r5
0100111001101011_1011000010001000
2b. strb r1, r0, r2 and ror r3, r6
0100000011101011_1100110101101000
2c.strb r1, r0, r2 and ror r7, r4
0100000011101011_1001110101101000
//11
3a. ldrb r1, r2, r3 and nop
0110100011101010_0000000000000000
3b. nop and ror r5, r2
0000000000000000_0101010101101000
3c.  nop and adc r6, r1
0000000000000000_0011100010001000
//Forward A2
//10
1a.nop and and r5, r6
0000000000000000_1101010110001000
1b. strb r2, r3, r5 and nop
1010110101101011_0000000000000000
//01
2a. nop and adc r5, r2
0000000000000000_0101010010001000

2b. nop and ror r3, r1
0000000000000000_0010110101101000

2c. strb r2, r3, r5 and nop
1010110101101011_0000000000000000
//11
3a.strb r2, r3, r4 and nop
1000110101101011_0000000000000000

3b.nop and and r3, r0
0000000000000000_0000110110001000

3c.strb r7,r6, r2 and nop
0101101111101011_0000000000000000
//B1
//10
1a. nop and adc r4, r5
0000000000000000_1011000010001000

1b. nop and and r6, r4
0000000000000000_1001100110001000

2a. nop adc r1, r7
0000000000000000_1110010010001000

2b. nop and sub r1, 00000001
0000000000000000_0000000100100101
//01
3a. nop and adc r4, r5
0000000000000000_1011000010001000

3b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

3c. nop and and r6, r4
0000000000000000_1001100110001000

4a.nop adc r1, r7
0000000000000000_1110010010001000

4b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

4c. nop and sub r1, 00000001
0000000000000000_0000000100100101
//11
5a.strb r4, r3, r2 and nop 
0100111001101011_0000000000000000

5b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

5c.nop adc r4, r6
0000000000000000_1101000010001000

6a.strb r4, r3, r2 and nop 
0100111001101011_0000000000000000

6b.nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

6c.nop sub r4, 00000001
0000000000000000_0000000110000101

//forward B2
//10
1a.nop and adc r4, r5
0000000000000000_1011000010001000

1b.strb r7, r4, r3 and nop
0111001111101011_0000000000000000

//11
2a. nop and adc r4, r5
0000000000000000_1011000010001000

2b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

2c.strb r7, r4, r3 and nop
0111001111101011_0000000000000000

//01
3a. strb r2, r3, r4 and nop
1000110101101011_0000000000000000

3b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

3c. strb r3, r4, r2 and nop
0101000111101011_0000000000000000

//forward C2
//11
1a. strb r2, r3, r4 and nop
1000110101101011_0000000000000000

1b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

1c. strb r2, r6, r7 and nop
1111100101101011_0000000000000000

//10
2a. nop and adc r4, r5
0000000000000000_1101010010001000

2b. strb r4, r5, r1 and nop
0011011001101011_0000000000000000

//01
3a. nop and adc r4, r5
0000000000000000_1101010010001000

3b. nop and ror r4, r7
0000000000000000_1111000101101000

3c. strb r4, r1, r2 and nop
0100011001101011_0000000000000000

//forward D2
1a.strb r4, r3, r2 and noop
0100111001101011_0000000000000000

1b. strb r4, r2, r1 and nop
0010101001101011_0000000000000000

1c. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

//````````````````````````````````````HAZARD DETECTION TESTING''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
//first
1a. nop and sub r7, 00000001
0000000000000000_0000000111100101

1b.	branch 10000001 adc r4, r5
1000000100011011_1011000010001000

//second
2a. strb r4, r5, r6 and nop
1101011001101011_0000000000000000

2b. branch 10000001 adc r4, r5
1000000100011011_1011000010001000

3a. strb r4, r5, r6 and nop
1101011001101011_0000000000000000

3b. nop and adc r7, r0
0000000000000000_0001110010001000

3c.branch 10000001 adc r4, r5
1000000100011011_1011000010001000
//third
4a.ldrb r4,r5,r6 nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

4b. nop and adc r5, r4
0000000000000000_1001010010001000
//fourth

5a.ldrb r4,r5,r6 nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

5b.nop and adc r4, r7
0000000000000000_1111000010001000
6a. ldrb r4,r5,r6 nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

6b.nop and sub r4, 00000001
0000000000000000_0000000110000101

//fifth//may have issues due to bracket
7a.ldrb r4, r5, r6 and nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

7b.ldrb r4, r7, r1 and nop
0011111001101010_0000000000000000

8a. ldrb r4, r5, r6 and nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

8b. ldrb r2, r4, r3 and nop
0111000101101010_0000000000000000

9a. ldrb r4, r5, r6 and adc r2, r1
1101011001101010_0010100010001000

9b. ldrb r1, r6, r4 and nop
1001100011101010_0000000000000000

//sixth
10a.ldrb r4, r5, r6 nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

10b. nop and nop
0000000000000000_0000000000000000

10c. branch 10000001 nop
1000000100011011_0000000000000000

//extra
11a. ldrb r4, r5, r6 nop
1101011001101010_0000000000000000

11b. branch 10000001 and nop
1000000100011011_0000000000000000
